gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 116, Clippers 106
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans defeated the Clippers, 116-106, and improve to 3-1 in West B play and 9-7 on the year. Zion Williamson led the Pelicans with a season high 32 points, along with six rebounds, and five assists as Brandon Ingram totaled 30 points, five assists, and four rebounds for New Orleans. Paul George led the Clippers with 34 points, eight rebounds, and two assists while Kawhi Leonard (20 points, eight rebounds) and Norman Powell (20 points) totaled 40 points. The Clippers move to 1-3 in West B play and 6-8 on the year.
